title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal

**Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat**

**Product Description:**

Take your yoga practice to the next level with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Designed for comfort and support, this extra-thick mat provides a soft cushion for your joints and spine, allowing you to focus on your poses with confidence.

**Product Details:**

* Dimensions: 72 inches long x 24 inches wide x 2/5 inch thick
* Weight: 3.11 pounds
* Color: Teal
* Material: High-quality NBR foam
* Suitable for: Yoga, Pilates, floor exercises, and more

**Key Features:**

* Extra-thick design for added comfort and support
* Soft cushioning for joint and spine protection
* Includes a convenient carrier strap for easy transport and storage

**Why Choose the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat?**

* Provides superior grip and traction to prevent slipping and falling
* Offers excellent cushioning and support for joints and spine
* Durable and long-lasting NBR foam construction
* Easy to clean and maintain
* Perfect for yoga enthusiasts of all levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners

**Order Your Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Today!**

Get ready to take your yoga practice to new heights with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Order now and experience the comfort, support, and confidence you need to focus on your poses and achieve your fitness goals.

**Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat**

Take your yoga practice to the next level with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. This premium exercise mat is designed to provide maximum comfort and support for your joints and muscles. Whether you're practicing yoga, Pilates, or floor exercises, this mat has got you covered.

**Key Features:**

* Extra thick (2/5 inch) for maximum comfort and support
* Soft cushion for joint protection and comfort
* Includes easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap for easy transport and storage
* Made from high-quality NBR foam for durability and grip
* Suitable for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises
* Dimensions: 72 inches long x 24 inches wide
* Weight: 3.11 pounds

**Why Choose This Mat?**

The Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat is perfect for anyone looking for a high-quality exercise mat that provides maximum comfort and support. Whether you're a yoga enthusiast, Pilates practitioner, or just starting out with floor exercises, this mat is a great choice.
